comment: при успехе Awarness_Table_Check и найденной фляге

languages.text: "Какой аромат! Пряный, терпкий... Я почти уверена, что пробовала вино с этим запахом раньше! Мон шер, им угощают в семействе Зауэрбэк".

traits.locale_text: "Какой аромат! Пряный, терпкий... Я почти уверена, что пробовала вино с этим запахом раньше! Мон шер, им угощают в семействе Зауэбек".

languages.text: "Oh, that scent! Spicy, a bit tart... I am almost sure that I have tasted a wine with this bouquet before... Mon cher, House Sauerback usually serves this wine to their guests."
languages.original_text: "Какой аромат! Пряный, терпкий... Я почти уверена, что пробовала вино с этим запахом раньше! Мон шер, им угощают в семействе Зауэрбэк".

traits.locale_text: "Such aroma! Spicy, a bit tart... I am almost sure that I have tasted the wine with this aroma before... Mon cher, House Sauerback usually serves this wine to their guests."
"Such aroma! Spicy, a bit tart... I am almost sure that I have tasted the wine with this aroma before... Mon cher, House Sauerback usually serves this wine to their guests."
"Oh, what an aroma! Spicy, a bit tart... I am almost sure that I have tasted the wine with this aroma before... Mon cher, House Sauerback usually serves this wine to their guests."

"Oh, that scent! Spicy, a bit tart... I am almost sure that I have tasted a wine with this bouquet before... Mon cher, House Sauerback usually serves this wine to their guests."
"Oh, that scent! Spicy, a bit tart... I am almost sure that I have tasted a wine with this bouquet before... Mon cher, House Sauerback usually serves this wine to their guests."

languages.text: 「へえ、なんていい香り！スパイシーで、ちょっと酸味があって…こんな香りのワインを飲んだことがあるはずですけど…モン・シェール、ザウアーバック家がいつも客人に振る舞うのがこのワインですよ」
languages.original_text: "Oh, that scent! Spicy, a bit tart... I am almost sure that I have tasted a wine with this bouquet before... Mon cher, House Sauerback usually serves this wine to their guests."

traits.locale_text: 「へえ、なんていい香り！スパイシーで、ちょっと酸味があって…こんな香りのワインを飲んだことがあるはずですけど…モン・シェール、ザウアーバック家がいつも客人に振る舞うのがこのワインですよ」

languages.text: “噢，多么馥郁的香气！辛辣，又带点儿果味……我以前肯定喝过这种美酒……亲爱的，是苏尔贝克家族，他们常常用这种酒招待客人。”
languages.original_text: "Oh, that scent! Spicy, a bit tart... I am almost sure that I have tasted a wine with this bouquet before... Mon cher, House Sauerback usually serves this wine to their guests."

traits.locale_text: “噢，多么馥郁的香气！辛辣，又带点儿果酸……我以前肯定喝过这种酒……亲爱的，是苏尔贝克家族，他们常常用这种酒招待客人。”

languages.text: « Oh, quel arôme ! Épicé, avec une légère touche d'acidité... Il me semble avoir déjà goûté un vin de ce genre... Oui, je me souviens ! La maison Sauerback le sert souvent à ses invités. »
languages.original_text: "Oh, that scent! Spicy, a bit tart... I am almost sure that I have tasted a wine with this bouquet before... Mon cher, House Sauerback usually serves this wine to their guests."

traits.locale_text: « Oh, quel arôme ! Épicé, avec une légère touche d'acidité... Il me semble avoir déjà goûté un vin de ce genre... Oui, je me souviens ! La maison Sauerback le sert souvent à ses invités. »

languages.text: «¡Vaya, menudo aroma! Especiado, un poco ácido... Me da a mí que he probado ya un vino así... Querido, la casa Sauerback suele servírselo a sus invitados».
languages.original_text: "Oh, that scent! Spicy, a bit tart... I am almost sure that I have tasted a wine with this bouquet before... Mon cher, House Sauerback usually serves this wine to their guests."

traits.locale_text: «¡Vaya, menudo aroma! Especiado, un poco ácido... Me da a mí que he probado ya un vino así... Querido, la casa Sauerback suele servírselo a sus invitados».

languages.text: "Oh, dieser Geruch! Würzig, mit einer leichten Süße ... Ich bin mir fast sicher, dass ich den Wein mit diesem Bukett schon einmal gekostet habe ... Mon cher, das Haus Sauerback serviert diesen Wein seinen Gästen."
languages.original_text: "Oh, that scent! Spicy, a bit tart... I am almost sure that I have tasted a wine with this bouquet before... Mon cher, House Sauerback usually serves this wine to their guests."

traits.locale_text: "Oh, was für ein Bukett! Würzig, mit einer leichten Süße ... Ich bin mir fast sicher, dass ich den Wein mit diesem Bukett schon einmal gekostet habe ... Mon cher, das Haus Sauerback serviert diesen Wein seinen Gästen."

languages.text: "Ha, o kokuyu diyorsun! Acı, biraz ekşi... Daha evvel aroması aynı olan bir şarabı tattığıma neredeyse eminim... Monşer, Sauerback Hanesi'nin misafirlerine sunduğu şarap bu."
languages.original_text: "Oh, that scent! Spicy, a bit tart... I am almost sure that I have tasted a wine with this bouquet before... Mon cher, House Sauerback usually serves this wine to their guests."

traits.locale_text: "Ha, o kokuyu diyorsun! Acı, biraz ekşi... Daha evvel aynı aromaya sahip bir şarap tattığıma neredeyse eminim... Monşer, Sauerback Hanesinin misafirlerine sunduğu şarap bu."
